## Singularity.getOwnedSourceFiles() method

Get a list of acquired Source-Files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOwnedSourceFiles(): SourceFileLvl[];
```
**Returns:**

[SourceFileLvl](./bitburner.sourcefilelvl.md)<!-- -->\[\]

Array containing an object with number and level of the source file.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 5 GB

Returns an array of source files. This function is obsolete: use [Player.sourceFiles](./bitburner.player.sourcefiles.md) from the return of [getPlayer](./bitburner.ns.getplayer.md) instead.
